name: Cryo Ward
description:
The character to which this is attached takes no DMG and cannot be Frozen.
This status will provide 2 instances of Cryo Infusion (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be unable to use Skills until the end of this Round.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>takes no DMG</color> and cannot be Frozen.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Infusion</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be <color=#FFFFFFFF>unable to use Skills</color> until the end of this Round.
